com.github.jhanne82.documenttree.simulation.utils

Class RandomNumberGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.jhanne82.documenttree.simulation.utils.RandomNumberGenerator

  • public class RandomNumberGenerator
extends java.lang.Object
    Implementation to generate a stream of pseudo random numbers. For pseudo random double value the generations relates to different distributions. This classes uses the current timestamp as milliseconds as seed for the pseudo random number generation.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RandomNumberGenerator() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double getDouble(Distribution distribution, int maxValue)
      Returns a pseudorandom double value between 0 (inclusive) and the specified maxValue (exclusive) related to the defined distribution.
      int getInt(int maxValue)
      Returns a pseudorandom int value between 0 (inclusive) and the specified maxValue (exclusive).

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • RandomNumberGenerator

    • Method Detail

      • getInt

        public int getInt(int maxValue)
        Returns a pseudorandom int value between 0 (inclusive) and the specified maxValue (exclusive).
        Parameters:
        maxValue - is the exclusive upper bound, must be greater than 0
        Returns:
        the next pseudorandom int value from this random number generator's sequence

      • getDouble

        public double getDouble(Distribution distribution,
                        int maxValue)
        Returns a pseudorandom double value between 0 (inclusive) and the specified maxValue (exclusive) related to the defined distribution.
        Parameters:
        distribution - defines the distribution of the generated pseudorandim double double value: EQUALLY, GAUSSIAN, EXPONENTIALLY
        maxValue - is the exclusive upper bound, must be greater than 0
        Returns:
        the next pseudorandom double value from this random number generator's sequence
